snippet: Three skiers were killed and five injured when an avalanche swept through a mountain pass on Thursday near the resort of Courmayeur in northern Italy, rescuers said....

headline.main: Review: The New York Philharmonic Plays a Piece Inspired by Night
headline.print_headline: The Goddess of Night Is Also a Muse

lead_paragraph: Three skiers were killed and five injured when an avalanche swept through a mountain pass on Thursday near the resort of Courmayeur in northern Italy, rescuers said.
